item.title: Resources
item.description: Here’s a collection of resources that I consider some of the best in each subject. These are not Bourbaki-style, highly abstract texts; instead, they aim to motivate concepts through examples and intuition while maintaining rigor. Mathematics Logic and Proofs Book of Proof — Richard Hammack PDF Single Variable Calculus Calculus — Michael Spivak Multivariable Calculus Analysis on Manifolds — James Munkres Analysis Understanding Analysis — Stephen Abbott Linear Algebra Linear Algebra Done Right — Sheldon Axler Complex Analysis Complex Analysis — Elias M.

item.title: Notes
item.description: Here’s the notes I took in the honours maths courses at BRAC University: Fall 2024 MAT314: Abstract Algebra Spring 2025 MAT422: Theory of Numbers (incomplete)

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Mahmudul Hasan Turjoy, I am a maths major at BRAC University. I have interest in maths. Right now, my fave mathematicians are: Galois, Gauss, Cauchy, Fourier.
